name: serviceswebcarto.mern.gouv.qc.ca/pes/services
description: Data catalog (or service catalog) for geospatial web services provided by the Ministère de l’Environnement, de la lutte contre les changements climatiques, de la Faune et des Parcs du Québec (MERN), a Québec government department. The site hosts web mapping and data services for ecological and environmental data. Exact thematic and categorical details are not explicitly provided in the URL; inference based on agency and typical service offerings.
owner_name: Ministère de l’Environnement, de la lutte contre les changements climatiques, de la Faune et des Parcs du Québec (MERN)
